mapper.select: SELECT `membership_ID` membershipID, `status` status, `fee_PerMonth` feePerMonth, `data_Joined` dataJoined, `account_ID` accountID FROM Joined_Membership
SELECT `account_ID` accountID, `gender` gender, `registeration_Date` registerDate, `birth_Date` birthDate, `age` age, `account_Name` accountName FROM User_Account

SELECT `account_ID` accountID, `gender` gender, `registeration_Date` registerDate, `birth_Date` birthDate, `age` age, `account_Name` accountName FROM User_Account WHERE ${type} > #{min} AND ${type} < #{max} AND gender in (${gender})
